Title: Episode #1.7
Writer: Sacha Baron Cohen, Anthony Hines, Lee Kern, Scotty Landes, Adam Lowitt, Dan Mazer, Kurt Metzger, Eric Notarnicola, Brian Reich, Dan Swimer
Actors: Sacha Baron Cohen, Roy Elghanayan, Emanuela Postacchini, Barney Frank
Plot: Sacha interviews former Democratic congressman Barney Frank; does an audition for going undercover at a liberal lesbian rally; and finishes the season with an interview with OJ Simpson.
